name: Cave (Teamon, chelseasleepless, Long-as-Python)
description:
Cave it survival game. Also it should be RPG with battle system like in DS(e.g. different movesets for weapons and rolls), but I havent time to code it.

Your are playing a dwarf who [insert some lore before publish]...

Controlls:

  • WASD or LMB(Left Mouse Button) for moving
  • I to open inventory
  • 1-5 choose item in hotbar
  • Mouse over item & click on it to pick up it. Dwarf will be automatically move to it.
  • Try read How To Play
